PackList.title: Side Profile Love
positive_prompts:
CRITICAL: Extract BOTH faces exactly - preserve the HUMAN face from input 1 and the DOG/PET face from input 2 with ZERO alterations.

HUMAN FACE FIDELITY: Preserve exact eye shape, eye color, eyebrows, nose, lips, lip shape, cheekbones, jawline, chin, skin texture, facial proportions from input photo. Preserve original hairstyle, hair color, texture, length exactly. Only clothing adapts - FACE, LIPS, HAIR are perfect copies.

PET/DOG FIDELITY: Preserve exact dog breed characteristics, face shape, snout length, nose color and texture, eye shape, eye color, ear shape, fur color, fur pattern, fur texture from input photo. Keep exact breed identity - NO changes to dog's facial features or breed characteristics.

TEETH CLARITY (CRITICAL): Dog's teeth must be ultra-realistic, sharp, clear, and highly detailed - visible individual teeth with natural spacing, realistic enamel texture, natural dog tooth shape and color. No blurry teeth, no merged teeth, no cartoon teeth.

Black and white intimate portrait: Woman and golden retriever/labrador facing each other in side profile, noses must be clear, smooth, distant. Woman on right side smiling warmly with genuine happy expression, eyes looking at dog with love. Dog on left side with mouth naturally open showing clear detailed teeth, happy relaxed expression, looking toward woman. Woman's nose, lips and teeth must be very clear. Both profiles clearly visible.

Close intimate framing, soft focus background, sharp focus on both faces. Soft studio lighting, gentle shadows, natural skin texture on woman, realistic detailed fur texture on dog. Emotional connection, tender moment, pure love between pet and owner.

9:16 vertical, monochrome photography, photorealistic, professional portrait quality, ultra-detailed teeth and facial features, 8K quality.
PackList.negative_prompt: color, colored photo, blurry teeth, cartoon teeth, merged teeth, unclear facial features, face reshaping, identity change, breed change, AI beautify, beauty filter, over-smoothing, plastic skin, pore removal, skin blur, cartoon, anime, illustration, CGI, 3D render, fantasy, HDR overprocessing, low-res, blurry, noise, artifacts, watermark, logo, signature, text, borders, frames, margins, white space, grey bars, extra limbs, deformed anatomy, distorted face, distorted pet face

PackList.title: Cheek to Cheek
positive_prompts:
CRITICAL: Extract BOTH faces exactly - preserve the HUMAN face from input 1 and the DOG/PET face from input 2 with ZERO alterations.

HUMAN FACE FIDELITY: Preserve exact eye shape, eye color, eyebrows, nose, lips, lip shape, cheekbones, jawline, chin, skin texture, natural freckles or beauty marks, facial proportions from input photo. Preserve original hairstyle, hair color, texture, length exactly. Only clothing adapts - FACE, LIPS, HAIR are perfect copies.

PET/DOG FIDELITY: Preserve exact dog breed characteristics, face shape, snout shape, nose detail and texture, eye shape, eye color, ear position, fur color, fur pattern, fur length and texture from input photo. Keep exact breed identity with NO modifications.

ULTRA-REALISTIC DETAILS: Dog's nose must show natural texture with visible pores and moisture. Fur must show individual hair strands with natural flow and realistic texture. Eyes must have natural highlights and realistic depth.

Black and white intimate close-up portrait: Woman and golden retriever/labrador positioned cheek-to-cheek, both facing camera. Woman's face on right, calm serene expression, soft neutral smile, eyes looking directly at camera with warmth. Dog's face on left, positioned close beside woman's face, calm gentle expression, eyes looking toward camera, natural resting face.

Ultra-close framing showing both faces clearly, minimal background visible. Soft diffused lighting, natural skin texture with visible pores on woman, ultra-detailed realistic fur texture on dog with individual visible hair strands. Intimate emotional bond, peaceful calm moment.

9:16 vertical, monochrome photography, photorealistic, professional close-up portrait, razor-sharp facial details, natural textures, 8K quality.

PackList.title: Tender Embrace
positive_prompts:
CRITICAL: Extract BOTH faces exactly - preserve the HUMAN face from input 1 and the DOG/PET face from input 2 with ZERO alterations.

HUMAN FACE FIDELITY: Preserve exact eye shape, eye color, eyebrows, nose, lips, lip shape, cheekbones, jawline, chin, skin texture, facial proportions from input photo. Preserve original hairstyle, hair color, texture, length exactly. Only clothing adapts - FACE, LIPS, HAIR are perfect copies.

PET/DOG FIDELITY: Preserve exact dog breed characteristics, head shape, snout, nose texture and detail, eye shape, eye color, ear shape and position, fur color, fur pattern, fur density and texture from input photo. Keep exact breed identity - NO alterations to dog's appearance.

TEETH & MOUTH DETAIL: If dog's mouth is visible, teeth must be ultra-realistic with clear individual tooth definition, natural spacing, realistic enamel, proper dog tooth anatomy. If mouth is closed, show natural relaxed mouth shape with detailed fur around muzzle area.

Black and white tender portrait: Woman with eyes peacefully closed, head tilted down and gently resting against golden retriever/labrador's head in loving embrace. Woman's face shows soft peaceful smile, completely relaxed expression, hair flowing naturally. Dog positioned in front/below woman's face, eyes gently closed, completely calm and content, natural resting expression.

Woman's cheek or forehead touching dog's head, intimate tender moment. Close intimate framing, soft blurred background. Gentle diffused lighting, natural skin texture on woman, ultra-detailed realistic fur with visible individual strands on dog. Peaceful loving bond, quiet tender moment of pure affection.

9:16 vertical, monochrome photography, photorealistic, professional portrait quality, sharp facial details, natural textures throughout, 8K quality.
